types.section:
{{fr-noun|m|f=+|f2=Lettone}}

# [[Latvian]], resident or native of [[Latvia]]

====Usage notes====
* There is a less common feminine singular form {{m|fr|Lettone}}, which is recommended by some dictionaries (e.g. Larousse) by analogy with {{m|fr|Lettonie}}.
types.html:
Letton m (plural Lettons, feminine Lettonne or Lettone)

  1. Latvian, resident or native of Latvia

Usage notes

[edit]
  • There is a less common feminine singular form Lettone, which is recommended by some dictionaries (e.g. Larousse) by analogy with Lettonie.
trans: Latvian, resident or native of Latvia
